scripts.create:networks: docker network create microchain_dev && docker network create microchain_staging && docker network create microchain_prod
scripts.qa: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:docker -- up api webapp
scripts.dev:api:root: npm run dev:docker -- exec -u root api bash
scripts.dev:api:test: npm run dev:docker -- run --rm --no-deps api npm run test
scripts.dev:webapp:root: npm run dev:docker -- exec -u root webapp bash
scripts.dev:webapp:test: npm run dev:docker -- run --rm --no-deps webapp npm run test
